Methods

Find<T>(FieldInfo, bool)

Finds an instance of a certain attribute class.

public static T? Find<T>(FieldInfo anInfo, bool anInherited = true) where T : Attribute

Parameters

anInfo FieldInfo

Field to search attribute for.

anInherited bool

When true search also inherited attributes.

Returns

T

The first attribute of type T or null if none could be found.

T

A subclass of Attribute
